content:
Based on the information you provided, here's your updated LinkedIn profile:

Ryan Mioduski (He/Him)
Senior Digital Advertising Strategist at Middle Seat Digital

🔹 Expertise in political digital advertising
🔹 Driven by data and analytics
🔹 Passionate about progressive campaigns and causes

Summary:

As an analytical and experienced digital advertising professional with over four years of experience, I specialize in helping clients exceed their online fundraising goals and reach persuadable audiences through data-driven messaging and strategy. With a track record of successfully managing a diverse range of clients, including the Biden Victory Fund, Morgan Harper, Lucas Kunce, and 350.org, I bring a results-oriented mindset and a strong commitment to teamwork and mentorship.

Experience:

Middle Seat Digital
Senior Digital Advertising Strategist
Sep 2021 - Present (1 yr 7 mos)

🔸 Lead strategy and execution for major client accounts, including Morgan Harper, Lucas Kunce, 350.org, and Greg Casar
🔸 Developed agency-wide attribution and reporting scheme
🔸 Manage client relationships and internal teams to consistently meet or exceed client objectives
🔸 Direct the reporting committee's tasks and objectives since September 2021
🔸 Mentor and support junior employees in ad optimization and analysis

Digital Advertising Strategist
Apr 2020 - Sep 2021 (1 yr 6 mos)

🔸 Played a key role in supporting the Biden Victory Fund account, helping raise $100MM in 100 days
🔸 Successfully achieved profitability within 9 months for a global environmental non-profit with ongoing investments in email acquisition totaling more than $240k

Blueprint Interactive
Digital Campaigns Associate
Feb 2018 - Apr 2020 (2 yrs 3 mos)

🔸 Created, optimized, and reported on digital advertising campaigns for clients, including major Senate IEs, unions, candidates, and PACs

U.S. House of Representatives
Digital Intern (Non-consecutive)
Served multiple committees and members, including the Office of the Democratic Whip, Oversight and Reform, and Representative Rosa DeLauro.

Education:

Virginia Tech
Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Political Science and Government
2012 - 2016

Skills:

🔹 Time Management
🔹 Creative Solutions
🔹 Writing
🔹 Data Analysis
🔹 Teamwork & Mentorship

Licenses & Certifications:

🔸 Edge Academy Certified: Trading Essentials - The Trade Desk
🔸 Commercial Drone Operator - Remote Pilot (Part 107.64) - Federal Aviation Administration
🔸 Datorama Specialist Certification - Datorama, a Salesforce Company

Feel free to make any changes or additions, and let me know if you have any questions. Good luck with your job search!
